title: Awesome, Prewar Apt., Renovated, Near J Train, Must See!
posting_body: ['This awesome apartment has been renovated featuring an updated kitchenette with natural wood cabinets LIKE-NEW APPLIANCES, and more.', 'Wood oak floors in the living room and bedroom.', 'Windowed bathroom with wall-tiling throughout and more.', 'High ceilings, ornate moldings are consistent with the architectural design of the building.', 'Situated on the first floor of a three-story Prewar brownstone building for your moving convenience.', 'The spacious bedroom accommodates a queen size bed with sunlit exposure.', 'Located in the back of the building for privacy.', 'Two floor-to-ceiling closets for storage.', 'Internet ready.', 'The common areas of the building have also been recently renovated.', 'The landlord is responsible for heat and hot water; tenant pays cooking gas and electric only.', 'NO PETS.', 'Lease terms: One year.', 'Availability, August 15th, 2022.', 'Conveniently located one block from Broadway and the J train at the Gates Avenue station.', 'Only a short trip into Manhattan.', 'Bushwick has sometimes been described as a unique melding of the East Village and Williamsburg, rolled into the industrial setting of Northeastern Brooklyn.', 'This trendy and fashionable neighborhood makes it a destination place.', "Don't miss out on this special unit.", 'Showings will be conducted in accordance with the NYS guidelines for social distancing due to the COVID-19 pandemic.', 'Please call me to set up an in-person showing.']
